snippet.title: 蛮勇戦域VARVARION_GuerrillaCollective2022 Footage
snippet.description:
GuerrillaCollective2022で流されたゲームプレイ動画です。
Some Gameplay Footage shown at the GuerrillaCollective2022

「蛮勇戦域バルバリオン」は個人で開発中の高速３D剣戟アクションゲームです。
2022年も各種インディーゲームイベント出展予定。
VARVARION is a high-speed sword combat action game solo project.
Will be showcased at various Indie game events in 2022 and later.

Game Engine :UNITY

Developed by POLYGONOMICON
Homepage: https://varvarion.com/
Twitter:https://twitter.com/polygonomicon

music from YouFulca (https://wingless-seraph.net)
